text: we have updated our app, we also have a *FREE PLAN* that will compress 50 images but we have also got image alerts now that show you height and width of images giving you an opportunity to make the smaller for the paid plan i Have a code for this community which is 25% off, if you have a lot of clients reach out we have an agency plan  Code is *HSDEVCOM*  <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/seo/HubSpot-image-compression>
